dialogue.introduction: Oh, I haven't introduced myself yet, have I? My name is Arashio.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the Kobe girl destroyer. Yes, I'm Arashio. My sisters and I worked hard in a lot of places. The only thing is, I really do dislike having my smokestack destroyed by bombers.
dialogue.secretary1: Ufufu, not done with the resupply yet?
dialogue.secretary2: I'm looking forward for the next operation~
dialogue.secretary3: Rather than that, isn't that the enemy's plane?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Oh... has Arashio been forgotten, I wonder? How troubling...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Everybody admires the Admiral, you know? That Michishio, she really does, no? Ufufufufu.
dialogue.wedding: Ufufufufufu. Though I'm quite persistent, am I also quite resistent, I wonder...
dialogue.equipment2: Oh my, what a wonderful thing to do.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'll take my leave for just a little.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Oh my, how troublesome. I've taken a quite the damage.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: I'll go on a rampage now~
dialogue.night_battle: I told you there's no escape, right?
dialogue.mvp: The goddess of victory is right here~ Catch me quickly~
dialogue.sunk: Oh my... you've sunk me... you'll regret this...
dialogue.fall_2015: Ehehe. So it's autumn. Autumn makes me feel just a liiiiittle bit sad. But I'm fine. You sure are nice, ehehehe!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Ufufufuâ™ª Everyone is busy. It's December so it's important. Eh? I should also be on cleaning duty? Ufufufu, that's right.
dialogue.new_year_2016: It's a new year. Ufufufu... Happy New Year! During this new year as well...I request of you to take care of me, okay? Ufufufu.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Oh my, it's Setsubun. Ufufufu. Sisters, why are you throwing beans so seriously? If it hits, it'll be a bit dangerous, you know?
